name: Microwave 5-Minute Mac 'N' Cheese Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: elbow macaroni, water, milk, salt, pepper, shredded cheddar cheese, fresh chives
recipeInstructionSteps: Mix the macaroni, water, and salt in a microwaveable mug.
Add the milk, cheese, salt, and pepper, then stir.
Microwave for another 30 seconds, stir, and garnish with a sprinkle of chives.
